title: Avengers
author: Joss Whedon
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army.

title: Batman
author: Tim Burton
description: Batman battles the Joker who is spreading chaos in Gotham City.

title: Spiderman
author: Sam Raimi
description: Peter Parker becomes Spider-Man and must face the Green Goblin.

title: Ironman
author: Jon Favreau
description: Tony Stark builds an armored suit and becomes Iron Man.

title: Superman
author: Zack Snyder
description: Batman takes on Superman while the world wrestles with what kind of hero it really needs.

title: Thor
author: Kenneth Branagh
description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he learns what it takes to be a true hero.
